      Classes in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions that implement ExtensionViewFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SynchronizedExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>
      A SynchronizedExtension is an extension which is localized and invoked by correct thread by using the ThreadSyncWrapperAndLocalizationSetter.
